snippet: Kim Jong-un, who called for an end to the “confrontation” with South Korea, also laid out broad policy guidelines for the new year.
abstract: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un issues major policy statement on New Year's Day, laying out broad policy guidelines for 2013; also calls for end to confrontation with rival South Korea in what appears to be an overture to incoming South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye.
lead_paragraph: Kim Jong-un, who called for an end to the “confrontation” with South Korea, also laid out broad policy guidelines for the new year.

headline.seo: Kim Jong-un, North Korean Leader, Makes Overture to South
headline.main: North Korean Leader Makes Overture to South
headline.print_headline: North Korean Leader Seems to Reach Out to the South
